channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Christmas Trees Dumped on Street, 21st January
item.description:
Residents have left their trees here, as they have done for the ladt 11 years, but this year Hackney Council have not removed them and they are till there. Please can they be collected.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Coster Avenue, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Strong smell coming from alley, 21st January
item.description:
Consistent fly tipping and strong smell coming from rubbish, rat infestation caused from failure to collect fly tipping and bins of properties.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Prince Of Orange Lane, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish scattering pavement, 21st January
item.description:
Pavement and street, both sides of Burnley Road are covered in litter. Especially around the cycle loop, it happens all the time.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14-25, Burnley Road, Stockwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped sofa still there!, 21st January
item.description:
You closed the previous report saying it has been resolved. The sofa is still there and blocking the pavement!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Church Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog fouling, 21st January
item.description:
There has been dog fouling happening almost everyday. As there is a park that connect to the road, people often walk there’s dogs to the park. It’s has become unbearable as we have had to clean the pavement constantly.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Admaston Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More dumped household goods, 21st January
item.description:
Another week - another fly tip on this verge. Please kindly remove as usual. Can anything be done to prevent this! It is infuriating!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Evergreen Close, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Council workers left tree cuttings everywhere, 21st January
item.description:
Last week council staff did some tree surgery. Instead of removing the tree debris, the common was left covered in cut branches etc. The picture shows it's no longer possible to cross the road here due to the blockage. As mentioned, there are piles of branches everywhere, which are a trip hazard and a fire risk(how long till someone sets fire to them?) They are also getting spread by wind. Please clear ASAP.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Swingate Lane, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large tree branch has fallen from tree and needs clearing, 21st January
item.description:
Large branch fell and was blocking communal pathway has been moved to base of tree - tree branches need clearing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Broad Oak Close, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Homerton Neighbourhood Office, 21st January
item.description:
This is a council owned property covered in graffiti, that is encouraging more graffiti in the local area. Some of the graffiti has been removed from a previous request, but the shopfront has attracted more graffiti. Please arrange removal.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Well Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water not draining opposite Thatcham Court in the slip road, 21st January
item.description:
Every time it rains water collected in the slip road and is a drenching hazard for pedestrians when cars use the slip road to bypass the high road traffic. I was soaked by one car and was just recovering when another car sped by and drenched me again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1443 - 1465, High Road, Whetstone, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
